entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 11.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 30 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MDT Friday 24 March 2023
